title: A1311 wont boot into osx
message: A local pc shop brought in an imac that hangs up during start up, I tried it with my test drive and it did the same thing. I ran ASD EFI everything passed and i ran OS and everything passed there too. i figured it was likely the graphics but it passed the test. what would you think the issue is? his client is persistent to have it fixed. i have replacement parts in stock to swap anything you might think.

title: A1311 wont boot into osx
message: Disconnect internal HDD and try good RAM first.

title: A1311 wont boot into osx
message: He wanted to buy ram and a new hdd off me and try that, he said one of them fixed it.  Thumbs up

title: A1311 wont boot into osx
message: Did you inform about the thermal sensor issue with the HDD? Probably not and now the fan will start running high.
